name: avatar
description: Get the avatar of a user or yourself.

options.name: user
options.description: The user whose avatar you wanna get. Leave empty for yourself.

name: embed
description: Make the bot send an embed

options.name: description
options.description: '\n' for newline. '\\n' for '\n' in the text. The description of the embed

options.name: timestamp
options.description: Show the timestamp on the embed.

options.name: author
options.description: The author on the embed

options.name: authoriconurl
options.description: The author's icon on the embed

options.name: authorurl
options.description: The author's URL on the embed

options.name: color
options.description: The color of the embed in hex (#rrggbb)

options.name: title
options.description: The title of the embed

options.name: image
options.description: The image of the embed

options.name: thumbnail
options.description: The thumbnail of the embed

options.name: footer
options.description: The footer text on the embed

options.name: footericonurl
options.description: The footer icon on the embed

options.name: customtimestamp
options.description: Custom Timestamp in 'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mm:ss' format

name: ping
description: Replies with pong and the latency of the bot

name: purge
description: Clears a certain amount of messages from the channel.

options.name: count
options.description: {1-100} The amount of messages to delete. Ignores pinned messages!

options.name: message
options.description: '\n' for newline. '\\n' for '\n' in the text. The message to say

name: webhook
description: Make a customizable webhook say something

options.name: attachment
options.description: Use an attachment to set the webhook's avatar

options.name: avatar
options.description: The avatar of the webhook

options.name: displayname
options.description: The display name of the webhook

options.name: message
options.description: '\n' for newline. '\\n' for '\n' in the text. The message to say

options.name: url
options.description: Use an URL to set the webhook's avatar

options.name: avatar
options.description: The avatar of the webhook

options.name: displayname
options.description: The display name of the webhook

options.name: message
options.description: '\n' for newline. '\\n' for '\n' in the text. The message to say

options.name: noavatar
options.description: Use no avatar for the webhook

options.name: displayname
options.description: The display name of the webhook

options.name: message
options.description: '\n' for newline. '\\n' for '\n' in the text. The message to say
